ca.projectTOMi.tomi.controller

Class UserAccountController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.projectTOMi.tomi.controller.UserAccountController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200")
public class UserAccountController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles HTTP requests for UserAccount objects in the ProjectTOMi system.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Karol Talbot

        @GetMapping(value="/user_accounts/{id}")
public org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<UserAccount> getAccount(@PathVariable
                                                                                                              java.lang.Long id,
                                                                                                              @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                              UserAuthManager authMan)
        Returns a resource representing the requested UserAccount to the source of a GET request to /accounts/id.
        Parameters:
        id - unique identifier for the UserAccount
        Returns:
        Resource representing the UserAccount object.

      • setUserAccountInactive

        @DeleteMapping(value="/user_accounts/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> setUserAccountInactive(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                      java.lang.Long id)
        Sets the requested userAccount's active attribute false, removing it from the list of active accounts. Responds to the DELETE requests to /accounts/id.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier for the userAccount to be set inactive
        Returns:
        a response without any content
